channel.title: Abouts on Allen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Allen's Blog

item.title: Me
item.description: Who Am I Hello world! Here is Allen Hu, a computer science student at UCSB -> CMU. You are more than welcome to read my resume here! 我在江西长大，后迁至深圳，在圣塔芭芭拉读书——一座僻静、祥和、如画的海滨小镇。 Reading Reading is my biggest hobby. I believe that the god’s most precious gift to us is the ability to read and write. To be more specific, I like both ancient and modern Chinese literature. I enjoy reading classical Chinese. For genres, I like all novels, prose, travel notes, sketch, poems, etc.
